cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and shine up high, but only come out in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle!
😴 I appear when you are asleep
🔥 I’m far away and very hot.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and give you light, but I’m not a lamp, I'm in the day and bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 You can see me every day.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am a ball, but I am not for play, I have water and land and where you stay. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water!
🏡 You live on me.
🌎 I am a planet.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth each night, I'm not as bright as the sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me!
🌑 I change shape every night.

cosmos.question: I am red, and hot, and far away, I'm named after a god, what planet am I, say?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me!
🍫 I am the color of rust or chocolate.
👨‍🚀 I am the fourth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a shape, you can find me in the sky late. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Sometimes I look like an animal
🔗 I am a pattern in the sky.
✨ I am a group of stars.

cosmos.question: I am very big and have rings, I am a planet that the night brings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
🪐 I am further away from the Sun than Earth.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am big and cold, and very far away, I am a planet, but not a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I'm the farthest planet from the sun (now)!
🧊 I am a very cold planet.
💨 I am made of gas.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars and dust, with a spiral shape, you can trust. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 The Sun is a part of me.
🌀 I am shaped like a whirlpool.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am something that takes you to space, it's very fast, to travel at a pace. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🚀 I fly really high
🌌 I explore the planets.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of a frog!
🌱 Animals like to eat me.
⚽ You can play on me.

plant.question: I have a long stem and pretty petals. People like to give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I smell very nice.
☀️ I grow in a garden.
🎁 People give me as a present.

plant.question: I am big and tall, and I have leaves and a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍃 I have many leaves.
🪵 I am made of wood.

plant.question: I grow in the ground, and I'm orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a type of vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!
🧡 My color is orange.

plant.question: I am red and juicy, and I grow on a vine. I'm small and round. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am used to make pasta sauce.
☀️ I grow in the summertime.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I am a plant with a thick stem and I am very tall. Sometimes I have yummy yellow kernels on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Popcorn comes from me!
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me.
💛 I can be yellow.

plant.question: I am a plant that can climb. Sometimes I make grapes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I like to grow upwards, around fences.
🍷 Grown-ups sometimes drink juice made from the yummy fruit I make.
☀️ I love sunshine!

plant.question: I am a big plant with a hard trunk. People like to put lights on me in December. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am a symbol of Christmas.
🌲 I am always green, even in winter.
🎁 I have needles instead of leaves.

plant.question: I am a plant with a stem covered in thorns and very fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often given as a sign of love.
🌹 I have prickly thorns to protect myself.
💕 People often give me to say 'I love you'.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant that lives for a very long time. Some people even make houses out of me in jungles far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Some animals like monkeys live in me.
🌴 You can find me in a hot and tropical climate.
🥥 I grow coconuts.
